description:
Saya is a messenger, just like http://anidb.net/ch51233 [Amy]. She`s friends with http://anidb.net/ch51230 [Melty], and the three are always together. She`s bit laid back, but tight when it comes to money. Both men and women admire her glamorous figure. She`s 15.
Source: ANN
name: Saaya
